endpoints.description: Add a new recycling center to the database, including location, capacity, and contact details.
Retrieve detailed information about a specific recycling center by its unique ID.
Update the details of an existing recycling center by its unique ID.
Remove a recycling center record by its unique ID.
Add a new type of waste material to the database, including its composition and properties.
List all types of waste materials available in the database.
Create a request for recycling a specific material from a source location to a recycling center.
Check the current status of all pending or processed recycling requests.
Upload a report regarding sustainability metrics and recycling efficiency.
Retrieve analytics insights into trends and performance in recycling over time.
